sourcesContent:
<script>
import {
  Bar
} from 'vue-chartjs'

export default {
  extends: Bar,
  data () {
    return {
      datacollection: {
        labels: ['Day 1', 'Day 2', 'Day 3', 'Day 4', 'Day 5', 'Day 6'],
        datasets: [{
          label: '# of Votes',
          data: [10, 19, 3, 5, 2, 3],
          backgroundColor: [
            'rgba(255, 99, 132, 0.2)',
            'rgba(54, 162, 235, 0.2)',
            'rgba(255, 206, 86, 0.2)',
            'rgba(75, 192, 192, 0.2)',
            'rgba(153, 102, 255, 0.2)',
            'rgba(255, 159, 64, 0.2)'
          ],
          borderColor: [
            'rgba(255,99,132,1)',
            'rgba(54, 162, 235, 1)',
            'rgba(255, 206, 86, 1)',
            'rgba(75, 192, 192, 1)',
            'rgba(153, 102, 255, 1)',
            'rgba(255, 159, 64, 1)'
          ],
          borderWidth: 1
        }]
      },
      options: {
        scales: {
          yAxes: [{
            ticks: {
              beginAtZero: true
            },
            gridLines: {
              display: true
            }
          }],
          xAxes: [{
            ticks: {
              beginAtZero: true
            },
            gridLines: {
              display: true
            }
          }]
        },
        legend: {
          display: false
        },
        elements: {
          point: {
            radius: 0
          }
        }
      }
    }
  },
  mounted () {
    this.renderChart(this.datacollection, this.options)
  }
}
</script>

<style scoped lang="scss">
  .bar-chart {} 
</style>
